title: Why to Modernize with Blazor? A Winning Strategy for Your Next Application
description: Are you exploring how to modernize existing applications, moving from MVC, Razor Pages or Web Forms? Take a look at what Blazor brings to the table.

title: Safely use secrets in HTTP requests in Visual Studio 2022
description: In the 17.8 Preview 1 version of Visual Studio 2022 we have updated the HTTP file editor to enable you to externalize variables to make testing your Web APIs across different environments easier.

description: Since the Beta, we’ve added a type-checking optimization and made it possible to reference the paths of TypeScript implementation files in type-only imports.

title: A Few Interesting Ways To Use CSS Shadows For More Than Depth
description: Let’s experiment with different shadows — two CSS properties and a filter — to make interesting hover effects, different text styles, and even casting shadows on other shadows.

description: In this article, we are going to learn how to deploy ASP.NET Core applications to an Ubuntu Linux server with Apache.
